vocabulary.definition: A step-by-step procedure or formula for solving a problem
examples: The machine learning algorithm can predict user behavior with high accuracy.
Developers need to optimize the algorithm to improve performance.

vocabulary.definition: A computer system modeled on the human brain and nervous system
examples: Deep neural networks have revolutionized image recognition.
The neural network learned to identify patterns in the data.

vocabulary.definition: Having the ability to operate independently without human input
examples: Autonomous vehicles are becoming increasingly common on our roads.
The AI system is fully autonomous in making decisions.

vocabulary.definition: The process of drawing conclusions from data using AI models
examples: The model makes real-time inference based on incoming data.
Inference speed is crucial for mobile AI applications.

vocabulary.definition: A collection of data used for training AI models
examples: We need a larger dataset to improve model accuracy.
The dataset contains millions of labeled images.

vocabulary.definition: The process of making an AI system more efficient
examples: Model optimization is crucial for deploying AI on mobile devices.
They performed several rounds of optimization to improve performance.

vocabulary.definition: Training an AI model using labeled data
examples: Supervised learning requires a large amount of labeled training data.
The model was trained using supervised learning techniques.

vocabulary.definition: Systematic error in AI model predictions
examples: We need to check the model for potential bias in its predictions.
Bias in AI systems can lead to unfair outcomes.

vocabulary.definition: The process of repeating steps to improve AI model performance
examples: Each iteration of training improved the model's accuracy.
The team went through multiple iterations to refine the algorithm.

vocabulary.definition: Preparing data before feeding it into an AI model
examples: Data preprocessing is crucial for model performance.
The preprocessing step removes noise from the input data.
